meanings.definition: A type of tree with heart-shaped leaves and fragrant yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: The lindens in the park provide shade with their wide branches.
meanings.sent2: I love the sweet scent of lindens blooming in the spring.
meanings.sent3: The lindens in the garden seem to whisper secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: Under the lindens, it feels like being in a cozy, floral umbrella.
meanings.sent5: The lindens painted the landscape with their golden blossoms.

meanings.definition: The currency used in the virtual world of Second Life.
meanings.sent1: She saved up enough lindens to buy a virtual house in Second Life.
meanings.sent2: Players can earn lindens by participating in virtual activities.
meanings.sent3: In Second Life, even the pets can have their own lindens for treats.
meanings.sent4: His virtual business thrived, and he amassed lindens like a digital tycoon.
meanings.sent5: The lindens jingled in her virtual wallet, ready to be spent on adventures.
